    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur der Atome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure des atomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura dos átomos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura degli atomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή των ατόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de átomos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is fifth of five illustrations showing representations of atoms. Here, an atom with three shells and 12 electrons around a nucleus is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nucleus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shell</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Fünftel von fünf Abbildungen, die 
Darstellungen der Atome zeigen. Hier wird ein Atom mit drei 
Shells und 12 Elektronen um einen Kern gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est cinquième de cinq illustrations montrant 
des représentations des atomes. Ici, un atome avec trois 
interpréteurs de commandes interactifs et 12 électrons autour d'un 
noyau est montré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é fifth de cinco ilustrações que mostram 
respresentações dos átomos. Aqui, um átomo com três escudos
e 12 elétrons em torno de um núcleo são mostrados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un fifth di cinque illustrazioni che 
mostrano le rappresentazioni degli atomi. Qui, un atomo con tre 
coperture e 12 elettroni intorno ad un nucleo è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι πέμπτη πέντε απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
αντιπροσωπεύσεις των ατόμων. Εδώ, ένα άτομο με τρία 
κοχύλια και 12 ηλεκτρόνια γύρω από έναν πυρήνα εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es fifth de cinco ilustraciones que 
muestran representaciones de átomos. Aquí, un átomo con tres 
shelles y 12 electrones alrededor de un núcleo se muestra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atom</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
